title_text: "Steele's ""Soldier's Service and Pay Book"" Identification Card for Mechanical Transport Drivers
subject_terms_1: This is an identification card. It is printed in black ink on plain paper. The empty fields are filled with handwritten inscription in blue ink. There are two signatures at the bottom of the card. There are no tears seen on the card, and the edges are slightly folded. documents (object genre) military vehicles drivers' licenses
context_8: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
subject_terms_2: world wars identification cards Vehicles, Military Drivers' licenses
